answers.text:
Clarification please. By "e-voting" do you mean any manner of "electronic voting" (e.g., optical scan of voter-marked paper ballots, or perhaps touch-screen voting with or without paper back-up)? Or do you mean enabling voting over the Internet?

author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is interested in learning which US and Canadian local governments are currently using e-Voting.  If your agency is providing e-Voting or if you know of local governments that are using e-Voting, please let me know.  
Any information you can provide is appreciated.  
Pamela Muse  
Western Regional Director
